market_capÂ¶

The definition of predictor market_cap:

def parameter():
    para = {}
    para['predictor'] = 'market_cap'
    para['relate_finance_index'] = ['size']
    return para
def equation(df):
    df = df.copy()
    df['market_cap'] = df['size']
    return df

This definition is in written in file './codes/predictors/market_cap.py'. Here, 'size' represents the market value.

Tips:

  • Like 'market_cap.py', people can add new predictor file 'predictor_name.py' in the path './codes/predictors/'.

  • 'predictor_name' should keep consist with para['predictor']
